advisory.name: RLBA-2022:7131
advisory.topic: An update for WALinuxAgent is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
The Windows Azure Linux Agent supports provisioning and running Linux virtual
machines in the Microsoft Windows Azure cloud.
Bug fix:
Users of Windows Azure Linux Agent are advised to upgrade to this updated
package. The package should be installed on Linux disk images that are built to run in the Microsoft Windows Azure environment.
